LanguageData.VGE_GravcorePowerCoil.label: gravcore power coil
LanguageData.VGE_GravcorePowerCoil.description: A massive gravtech reactor that channels and amplifies gravitational wave energy into immense electrical output. Its reinforced coils can handle extreme flux, making it one of the most potent power sources available for gravships. Adjacent gravcore power cells will multiply the power output by 15% for each gravcore power cell.
LanguageData.VGE_GravshipCapacitor.label: gravship capacitor
LanguageData.VGE_GravshipCapacitor.description: Stores high amounts of electricity for later use. Constructed in the gravship substructure, gravship capacitors do not obstruct movement.
LanguageData.VGE_SolarPanelling.label: solar panelling
LanguageData.VGE_SolarPanelling.description: Produces electricity from sunlight. Does not work in the dark or under artificial light. Does not obstruct movement or provide cover, but can only be constructed on the gravship substructure.
